net.myorb.math.polynomial

Interface PolynomialCalculusSupport<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type on which operations are to be executed
    All Superinterfaces:
    TransformCalculus<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChebyshevPolynomialCalculus, ChebyshevPolynomialSpaceManager, ExponentialPolynomialCalculus, Fractal.Calculus, FunctionDerivativesTable, GegenbauerPolynomialSpaceManager, JacobiPolynomialSpaceManager, LegendrePolynomialSpaceManager, OrdinaryPolynomialCalculus, PolyMulTest, PolynomialComplexFunctionCharacteristics, PolynomialFloatingFunctionCharacteristics, PolynomialFunctionCharacteristics, PolynomialRoots, PolynomialSpaceManager

    public interface PolynomialCalculusSupport<T>
extends TransformCalculus<T>
    describe support layer for implementation of calculus operations
    Author:
    Michael Druckman

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T evaluatePolynomialDerivative(GeneratingFunctions.Coefficients<T> a, T atX)
      given a polynomial with specified coefficients compute the derivative of the function at specified x and return value
      T evaluatePolynomialIntegral(GeneratingFunctions.Coefficients<T> a, T atX)
      given a polynomial with specified coefficients compute the integral of the function at specified x and return value

      given a polynomial with specified coefficients compute the integral of the function over the specified intervals.
      T evaluatePolynomialIntegral(GeneratingFunctions.Coefficients<T> a, T fromX, T toX)
      given a polynomial with specified coefficients compute the integral of the function over the specified interval

    • Method Detail

      • evaluatePolynomialDerivative

        T evaluatePolynomialDerivative(GeneratingFunctions.Coefficients<T> a,
                               T atX)
        given a polynomial with specified coefficients compute the derivative of the function at specified x and return value
        Parameters:
        a - the coefficients of the polynomial
        atX - the value of x at which to evaluate
        Returns:
        the value of the derivative at x

      • evaluatePolynomialIntegral

        T evaluatePolynomialIntegral(GeneratingFunctions.Coefficients<T> a,
                             T fromX,
                             T toX)
        given a polynomial with specified coefficients compute the integral of the function over the specified interval
        Parameters:
        a - the coefficients of the polynomial being integrated
        fromX - the lo value of the interval at which to evaluate
        toX - the hi value of the interval at which to evaluate
        Returns:
        the value of the integral at x

      • evaluatePolynomialIntegral

        java.util.List<T> evaluatePolynomialIntegral(GeneratingFunctions.Coefficients<T> a,
                                             T fromX,
                                             java.util.List<T> toX)
        given a polynomial with specified coefficients compute the integral of the function over the specified intervals. one lo end for all intervals specified by multiple upper interval endpoints.
        Parameters:
        a - the coefficients of the polynomial being integrated
        fromX - the lo value of the intervals at which to evaluate
        toX - the hi values of the intervals at which to evaluate
        Returns:
        the value of the integral at x
